com.brightcove.player.event

Interface Component

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractButtonController, AbstractComponent, AbstractOfflineCatalog, AbstractOnceUxManager, AdCuePointComponent, AdInfoOverlayManager, AdMetadataStateManager, Analytics, AudioTracksButtonController, BaseVideoView, BrightcoveAudioTracksController, BrightcoveCastMediaManager, BrightcoveClosedCaptioningController, BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView, BrightcoveExoPlayerTextureVideoView, BrightcoveExoPlayerVideoView, BrightcoveMediaController, BrightcovePlayer, BrightcovePluginManager, BrightcoveSeekBarController, BrightcoveShowHideController, BrightcoveTextureVideoView, BrightcoveVideoView, CaptionsButtonController, Catalog, CloseButtonController, CompanionAdManager, DefaultSourceSelectionController, ExoPlayerSourceSelectionController, ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent, FastForwardButtonController, FreeWheelController, FullScreenButtonController, GetPlaylistTask, GetVideoTask, GoogleCastComponent, GoogleIMAComponent, LifecycleUtil, LiveButtonController, LoadCaptionsService, LoadCaptionsTask, LoadImageTask, OfflineCatalog, OmnitureComponent, OnceUxComponent, OnceUxSourceSelectionController, PictureInPictureButtonController, PlayButtonController, PlayerOptionsButtonController, ProgressManager, RewindButtonController, SeekButtonController, SeekManager, VideoDisplayComponent, VideoPlaybackController, VideoStillDisplayComponent, VMAPComponent, VRButtonController

    @Emits(events={"sample","event","list"})
 @ListensFor(events={"play","stop"})
public interface Component
    Classes that implement this interface will be designed to work with the EventEmitter System Classes that implement this interface should use the Emits and ListensFor annotations
